title: Crystal Goblet Layout
content:
Hi guys! Here’s another one of my assignments for my typography class. It’s a layout for the essay The Crystal Goblet by Beatrice Warde. Please let me know on what you think about it and things that I could change to make it better.

comments.content: You need to letterspace the caps in the fisrt line (till the huge period ?), you may dare a larger indention, too.

what are the grren rectangles for?? it is hardly in the spirit of the essay. and the green Letterforms in the title.

you are also using the LT version of Sabon. Ironic, really.

good lord.  
have you read this essay?

LOSE THE GREEN BOXES!

There is nothing simple or dull in achieving the transparent page.
